fireball_r1.name: Fireball
fireball_r1.description: Hurls a fiery ball that causes 14 to 23 Fire damage and an additional 2 Fire damage over 4 sec.
fireball_r1.tooltip_notes: Essential spell for Mage leveling. Low damage but reliable for pulling mobs.

greater_heal_r1.name: Greater Heal
greater_heal_r1.description: A slow casting spell that heals a single target for 924 to 1039.
greater_heal_r1.tooltip_notes: High mana cost but excellent healing efficiency. Use when you have time to cast.

enchant_weapon_crusader.name: Enchant Weapon - Crusader
enchant_weapon_crusader.description: Permanently enchant a melee weapon so that often when attacking in melee it heals for 75 to 126 and increases Strength by 100 for 15 sec.
enchant_weapon_crusader.tooltip_notes: High-end enchantment requiring expensive reagents. Popular for melee DPS and tanks.

free_action_potion.name: Free Action Potion
free_action_potion.description: Removes all movement impairing effects and grants immunity to them for 30 sec.

greater_fire_protection_potion.name: Greater Fire Protection Potion
greater_fire_protection_potion.description: Absorbs 1950 to 3250 fire damage. Lasts 1 hour.

crafting.reagents: Dark Iron Bar (4), Fiery Core (2), Lava Core (2)

thunderfury.name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker
thunderfury.description: Chance on hit: Blasts your enemy with lightning, dealing 300 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Each jump reduces that victim's Nature resistance by 25. Affects 5 targets. Your primary target is also consumed by a cyclone, slowing its attack speed by 20% for 12 sec.
thunderfury.tooltip_notes: Legendary weapon requiring Left and Right Binding of the Windseeker from Molten Core. The proc effect is one of the most powerful in the game.

flask_of_supreme_power.name: Flask of Supreme Power
flask_of_supreme_power.description: Increases damage done by magical spells and effects by up to 150 for 2 hr. Counts as both a Battle and Guardian elixir. This effect persists through death.

naxx_cleared_2024.name: Naxxramas Conqueror
naxx_cleared_2024.description: Defeated Kel'Thuzad and cleared Naxxramas with Fika Guild in 2024.

first_onyxia_kill.name: Onyxia's Lair
first_onyxia_kill.description: First guild kill of Onyxia - January 2024.

guild_bank.name: Fika Guild Bank
guild_bank.description: Community resource for consumables, crafting materials, and raid supplies. Maintained by guild officers.
